Assignment3

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • Assignment3.Knight

  • public class Knight
extends java.lang.Object
    A Knight object. - Knows its position on the board . - Knows the types of moves it can make. - Can tell you its current row and column. - Can determine if a move would be legal or not. - Can move.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Knight(Board board)
      Create a Knight object and set its position to start at the top left of the board, which is indexes [0][0].

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canMove(int row, int col)
      canMove is used when we need to determine if a knight still has possible moves left.
      int getCol()
      getCol is used when we need to get the current position of the knights col.
      int getRow()
      getRow is used when we need to get the current position of the knights row.
      boolean isLegal(int rowMove, int colMove)
      isLegal is used when we need to determine if the move a knight is trying to make is legal or not.
      void Move()
      Move is the method called to move the knight around the board in the tour The knight knows the possible moves it can make and will try each of them at random until a valid one is found.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Knight

        public Knight(Board board)
        Create a Knight object and set its position to start at the top left of the board, which is indexes [0][0].
        Parameters:
        board - This is the board that the knight is referring to when moving around the board. The board in this class is a reference to the board passed in this parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • getRow

        public int getRow()
        getRow is used when we need to get the current position of the knights row.
        Returns:
        this will return the row that the knight is currently located at, this is the index of the row portion of the 2D array.

      • getCol

        public int getCol()
        getCol is used when we need to get the current position of the knights col.
        Returns:
        this will return the col that the knight is currently located at, this is the index of the row portion of the 2D array.

      • isLegal

        public boolean isLegal(int rowMove,
                       int colMove)
        isLegal is used when we need to determine if the move a knight is trying to make is legal or not. A legal move must stay within the boundaries of the board and the spot must not have been visited already.
        Parameters:
        rowMove - the amount of spaces the knight would move in the rows.
        colMove - the amount of spaces the knight would move in the cols.
        Returns:
        true will be returned if the move is legal and can be done. false will be returned if the move is NOT legal and cannot be done.

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(int row,
                       int col)
        canMove is used when we need to determine if a knight still has possible moves left. If there are no moves available to make, i.e all 8 possible moves are not legal, then the tour ends.
        Parameters:
        row - the current position of the knight, the row its on.
        col - the current position of the knight, the col its on.
        Returns:
        a true statement if the knight still have available moves. a false statement if the knight is out of moves to make.

      • Move

        public void Move()
        Move is the method called to move the knight around the board in the tour The knight knows the possible moves it can make and will try each of them at random until a valid one is found.
